attributes.additional_details: E cigarettes have been a god send to me. After tens of efforts of trying to give up smoking this is the only thing that finally made me kick the filthy habit. I am not alone - out of the 8 friends I know who use them, 6 have stopped all together and the other two still use e-cigs but have never touched tobacco since. They have the potential to be one of the greatest inventions or discoveries for health since penicillin. Please don't doom thousands of people to early death just because of tax, do not ban these miracle gadgets!
